system.description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 6th-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 5th-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.

components.materialDescription: A tiny bag and a small candle (arcane); or a tiny bag and a small, straight piece of iron (divine).

system.target: One or more summoned creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
